rows.label: qst620203_msg0001
rows.name: Good. We're all here.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0002
rows.name: Does anyone have anything to report?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0003
rows.name:
I have felled all monsters on Iyasaki
Island, the Isle of Urchon, in the Ansel
Hatchery, all the way to Ysheva Harbor.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0004
rows.name:
I don't think anyone asked you to
go quite that far...

rows.label: qst620203_msg0005
rows.name:
Perhaps, but at least no more harm
will befall the village's fields.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0006
rows.name: Glen, how about you?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0007
rows.name:
I went and lectured every last soul
in Iyasaki, under the searing light of
justice!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0008
rows.name:
Weren't you supposed to be asking
about eyewitness accounts...?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0009
rows.name:
Huh, now that you mention it...
But never mind that, for I got results!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0010
rows.name:
I'm happy to announce, there's not
a single bad person in the village!
The salt of Alst, all of them!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0011
rows.name:
But, uh, people have been known to
conceal their true selves.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0012
rows.name:
In any group, there is at least one
outlier with darkness in their heart.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0013
rows.name:
But nobody'd just steal vegetables
from a field, right? Come on, nobody
here could do such a heinous thing!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0014
rows.name:
Also, nobody's seen anything
suspicious, either!!!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0015
rows.name:
Hmph.
Keep your emotions in check.
Stay calm, as Tokiha does.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0016
rows.name: ...Tch.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0017
rows.name: Well, what about you, Tokiha?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0018
rows.name:
I kept watch on the field without
so much as blinking.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0019
rows.name:
It sounds to me like you just enjoy
punishing yourself... Same as usual.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0020
rows.name:
Grr...
Say what you will, at least I made sure
nobody would steal any more produce.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0021
rows.name:
Nay. Your vigil was pointless, since
I had already eradicated the monsters.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0022
rows.name:
No no no, you're both wrong!
It's thanks to me lecturing the villagers
that nothing more got stolen!!!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0023
rows.name:
I don't think so... I'm confident that it
was my unflinching vigilance that
prevented further theft.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0024
rows.name: No way! No way is that true!!!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0025
rows.name: ... Driver, you be the judge of us.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0026
rows.name:
Who of us has done the best job?
Listen to your heart and answer
honestly!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0027
rows.name: Who has done the best job?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0028
rows.name: Vasara

rows.label: qst620203_msg0029
rows.name: Glen

rows.label: qst620203_msg0030
rows.name: Tokiha

rows.label: qst620203_msg0031
rows.name: Ha. An obvious choice.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0032
rows.name:
Awriiiiiiight!
I knew you'd say that!!!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0033
rows.name:
I'm honored. It's good to know
my efforts have been appreciated.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0034
rows.name: Erm... Sorry, but...

rows.label: qst620203_msg0035
rows.name: Mind if I get a word in edgewise?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0036
rows.name: That is, I...

rows.label: qst620203_msg0037
rows.name: Aiiieeeeeee!!!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0038
rows.name:
I see! So it was this miscreant
pilfering the goods!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0039
rows.name:
Is that guy so hungry that he had to
crawl out of the Cloud Sea? Cripes!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0040
rows.name:
...Hang on a moment! Vasara,
didn't you say you'd wiped out all
the monsters nearby?!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0041
rows.name:
You may remember I am no salvager.
Clearly the monsters of the Cloud Sea
are outside my remit.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0042
rows.name:
And yourself, did you not say you
would question the villagers?

rows.label: qst620203_msg0043
rows.name:
I find it hard to believe a giant fiend
such as this one could remain unseen
while stealing food.

rows.label: qst620203_msg0044
rows.name:
That's enough bickering, you two.
We've got our work cut out for us!

rows.label: qst620203_msg0045
rows.name:
Oh, right! Yeah!
Justice will be served!!!
